sys_update_version.payload: custom -1){ c.isFirefox = true; } $rootScope.kb_count = c.data.total_kb_count; $rootScope.articles_count = c.data.total_articles_count; if (c.data.sqaUiActive) $rootScope.socialqa_count = c.data.total_socialqa_count; $rootScope.isMobile = c.data.isMobile; c.getOrderedItems = function() { return $filter('orderBy')(c.data.result, c.options.order_by, c.options.order_reverse); } c.focusFirstElement= function(e){ $timeout(function(){$('div.kb-action-btns').children('ul').children('li:first-child').children('a').focus();}) } }]]>c.kb-browse-block{ margin: 0 -15px; } .kb-browse-section{ text-align: center; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; .kb-browse-title{ padding-bottom:10px; } .kb-header { font-weight: normal; } .kb-header-block { display: inline-block; h2 { font-size: 23px; } } .vertical-divider { padding-right: 12px; border-right: 1px solid #bdc0c4; line-height: 40px; } .kb-action-btns { top: -3px; display: inline-block; position: relative; margin-left: 2px; } .action-btns { margin-left:10px; height: 34px; } .menu-padding { margin-top: 2px; } .kb-browse-content{ margin: 0; .kb-tile-block { .kb-tile{ .kb-top-pad{ padding-top:20px; } .subscribe-link{ display:block; width: 100%; padding: 0px; text-decoration: none; &:focus{ outline: none; } &:focus > .kb-subscribe{ outline: 5px auto $brand-primary; outline-offset: -2px; } } .kb-top a{ display:block; } .kb-subscribe{ padding: 5px 10px; font-size: 16px; color:$brand-primary-darker; .unsub-icon i{ padding-right:4px; } .sub-icon i{ color: $text-muted; padding-right:7px; } .sub-text{ color:$text-muted; } .unsub-text:hover span{ display:none; } .unsub-text:hover:after{ content:attr(data-hover); } } .kb-tile-link { padding:10px 5px; .link-icon img, .link-icon i{ font-size: 50px; height:50px; color:#000000; } .link-text{ height: 40px; padding:0 5px; h3 { color:$text-color; font-weight: normal; display:block; display: -webkit-box; font-size: 16px; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; text-align:center; line-height:1.2em; } .big-title{ position:relative; line-height:1.2em; height:2.4em; } .big-title:after { content:"..."; font-weight:bold; position:relative; bottom:0; right:0; letter-spacing: .10em; } } } } } .kb-hide-me { display: none; } } .kb-details{ .kb-summary{ padding:4px; .kb-count{ padding:3px; font-size:13px; font-weight:400px; } } } .kb-bottom{ padding:0px; button:hover,button:focus{ background-color:$thumbnail-border; } .unsub-icon i:hover,.unsub-icon i:focus{ color:$brand-primary-darker; } } .kb-show-more{ padding-bottom: 15px; .btn{ text-decoration: none; } .show_less i{ vertical-align: middle; } } }sp_instancetitle,color,cssfalselh-kb-bases-browsefalse"+c.subscribedText+"");
